title: Bring back Feral Flare
body:
There should be more than one style of jungler. Jungling shouldn't be synonymous with ganking and winning other people's lanes for them.
Junglers who farm up and scale should be factored into the game as well.

replies.body: The main issue is junglers who dont gank are horrible outside of competitive play or well-organized premades.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4Wuk4bc0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-18T22:53:22.568+0000)
>
> The main issue is junglers who dont gank are horrible outside of competitive play or well-organized premades.

The game shouldn't be centered around comp play.
Exactly, which is why non-ganking junglers dont really work.

Feral Flare is not the solution to the jungle being one dimensional. Feral Flare was a huge issue on it's own. 

I think jungle respawn times, exp, and gold are all apart of the issue.
